column4: Federal Circuit saves part of Microsoft patent from Motorola challenge
column5: Microsoft Corp's patent on a way to show that a web browser is still loading content is not invalid  a U.S. appeals court said on Tuesday in the face of a challenge by Motorola Mobility and Google Inc.

column4: Tesla says it has not finalized 2017 Model 3 design
column5: SAN FRANCISCO/DETROIT Tesla Motors Inc  said on Tuesday the design of its new Model 3 has not been finalized  even though the electric car maker expects to begin building the mass-market sedan within the next 18 months.

column4: Tesla says it has not finalized 2017 Model 3 design
column5: SAN FRANCISCO/DETROIT  May 10 Tesla Motors Inc  said on Tuesday the design of its new Model 3 has not been finalized  even though the electric car maker expects to begin building the mass-market sedan within the next 18 months.
